name: Shipwreck!
description:
You are a shipwrecked pirate. It’s time to collect the gold that fell off the ship! Use jumps to make the wreckage float in the direction you want, but be careful of the water currents.

This is my Ludum Dare 49 COMPO entry. I didn’t finish the levels and the sound. But anyway, the current levels may well demonstrate the mechanics and style.
